definitions.definition: A pattern of squares of alternating colours .
A board , usually square, covered with such a pattern; especially such a board with 8×8 squares, used to play chess and draughts / checkers .
A style of negative cutting that avoids visible splice marks.

main_definition: A pattern of squares of alternating colours .
secondary_definitions: A board , usually square, covered with such a pattern; especially such a board with 8×8 squares, used to play chess and draughts / checkers .
( film ) A style of negative cutting that avoids visible splice marks.
